answer: Future studies can extend current work by analyzing galaxy correlation functions and pairwise peculiar velocity dispersion, as seen in astro-ph/0104023, to better understand galaxy biasing (astro-ph/0104023).
explanation: This paper provides a method for analyzing galaxy correlation functions and pairwise peculiar velocity dispersion, which can be extended to better understand galaxy biasing.
evidence_quote: galaxy biasing in cold dark matter models
